PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-09602008-05-16,  ,  ,  ,  ,  PWGS, 
ActPayments in Lieu of Taxes Act
PrecisReappointment of DAVID CAVAZZI of Blind Bay, British Columbia, MICHAEL NAISH of Comox, British Columbia, ROGER BEAUPRÉ of Calgary, Alberta, ALAN FENTON of St. Albert, Alberta, ANGUS N. MacKAY of Picton, Ontarioa, YVONNE J. HAMLIN of Toronto, Ontario, of Montréal, Quebec; JAMES L. McDONALD of Saint John, New Brunswick; GORDON NAGLE of St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador; JAMES H. YAMADA of Whitehorse, Yukon, and ALETTA ANNE KING of Whitehorse, Yukon; JOHN ERIC JACOBSEN, Iqaluit, Nunavut and GLENDA ZUKER, Iqaluit, Nunavut, JIM WHITE of Yellowknife, Northwest Territories, and LAUCHLIN R. MacDONALD of Yellowknife, Northwest Territories, and ROBERTA J. CLARKE of Halifax, Nova Scotia, to be members of the Payments in Lieu of Taxes Dispute Advisory Panel to hold office during good behaviour for a term of two years, effective May 19, 2008.
